THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.visual_reinforcement: Thumbnail visually conveys the core idea of the title ('YOU SMELL - how to improve your personal hygiene'). The person is pinching her nose in disgust, supported by cartoon smell lines, reinforcing the theme of bad odor and embarrassment.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: There is no major mismatch. The thumbnail humorously exaggerates the situation, matching the playful but direct tone of the title. The text on the thumbnail ('DEEP DOWN & PERSONAL') is less blunt than the YouTube title, but both imply intimate, potentially awkward hygiene issues.
